name: StaphylococcusAureusTestsForStaphAureusNucleicAcidInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSite
title: Staphylococcus aureus (Tests for Staph aureus Nucleic Acid in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of  Staphylococcus aureus nucleic acid in a specimen from a normally sterile site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Staphylococcus aureus nucleic acid in a specimen from a normally sterile site),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
